about_the_game:
An exciting adventure game that combines elements of searching, fishing, and mystery-solving. You play as an adventurer who must help his friend look for his missing father. The game takes place on an archipelago once claimed by the pirates, and every island has its own story and its own mystery.

Travel the archipelago, exploring the islands, caves, and shipwrecks. Every object has a unique story and might lead to precious artifacts or solutions to various mysteries.

Fishing is one of the key gameplay elements. Apart from classic fishing, players may seek underwater treasure and ancient relics. Every fish has its own habitat. Once a certain kind of fish has been caught, its zone will be marked on your map.

The game's protagonist is helping his friend search for his father. However, the plot is a lot more complicated than it may seem at first. You will meet many unusual characters and experience an intriguing story full of twists and turns.
